Urus Izin Di RI Masih Ribet, Peringkat Kemudahan Berusaha Mandek
03 Nov 2019, 00:08 by Hendra Kusuma


Ilustrasi Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Pengusaha masih merasakan proses pengurusan izin berusaha di tanah air masih ribet. Hal itu menjadi wajar jika Bank Dunia alias World Bank (WB) menetapkan peringkat kemudahan berusaha (ease of doing business/EoDB) Indonesia mandek di 73.Kemudahan berusaha Indonesia masih kalah jauh dibandingkan negara tetangga seperti Malaysia, Thailand, hingga Singapura.Pemerintah sendiri sudah gencar melakukan perombakan proses perizinan berusaha. Salah satunya dengan menerapkan sistem online single submission (OSS). Implementasi sistem tersebut sudah berjalan mulus di tingkat pusat namun belum di daerah. Berikut ulasannya:(hek/zlf)

Mind Permission in RI is still complicated, Ranking of Ease of Trying to Stagnate
03 Nov 2019, 00:08 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo Illustration: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Entrepreneurs still feel the process of obtaining a business permit in the country is still complicated. It becomes natural if the World Bank, aka the World Bank (WB), puts Indonesia's ease of doing business (EoDB) rank at 73. Indonesia's business ease is still far behind that of neighboring countries such as Malaysia, Thailand, and Singapore. The government itself has vigorously reformed the business licensing process. One of them is by implementing a single online submission system (OSS). Implementation of the system has proceeded smoothly at the central level but not yet in the regions.
